title: General Settings
description: Configure the basic details of the system or instance.

logoSection.title: Main Logo and Favicon
logoSection.mainLogoDescription: Will be used in various UI locations. Recommended: PNG or SVG format with transparent background.
logoSection.collapsedLogoDescription: Square version of the logo, for collapsed menus and avatars. Recommended: PNG or SVG format 1:1.
logoSection.faviconDescription: Icon that appears in the browser tab. Format .ico, .png, or .svg (32x32px).

regionalizationSection.title: Regionalization and Language
regionalizationSection.multilingualDescription: Enable to support multiple languages. Disable to optimize the system for a single language.

toasts.permissionDeniedDesc: You do not have permission to edit these settings.
toasts.validationErrorDesc: Please, correct the fields marked in red.
